General.Name: Jiangsu Boqian New Materials Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Boqian New Materials Stock Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells nanometer metal powder materials in China. The products include pure metal powders, including nickel, copper, copper flake, and silver powders; binary alloy powder, such as Cu-Mn, copper-nickel, silver bismuth, and iron silicon alloy powders; ternary alloy powder, including tin-silver-copper and tin-bismuth-silver alloy powders; and other powders, such as silicon powders, silver-coated copper and nickel powders, and 3D printed metal powders. Its materials are used in consumer electronics, automotive electronics, communications, industrial automation, aerospace, and other fields. Jiangsu Boqian New Materials Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Suqian, China.
